Name: Reven - Convert Movies
Description:
A user submitted template.  A video conversion flow that will convert videos to HEVC with AC3 audio.  

It will then move these to the Output folder and deletes the source folder, if there are no more video files found in it.

This will always move the input file to the output file, even if no processing is required.
Author: reven

Name: Reven - VP9 - YouTube
Description: A user submitted template.  Convert video to VP9/WebM/Opus/1080P and move to destination
Author: reven

Name: Reven - Convert TV Shows
Description: A user submitted template.  A video conversion flow that will convert videos to HEVC with normalized AC3 audio., optimized for TV.
Author: reven

Name: Convert Audio
Description: Will convert audio files to the specified format and replace the original file.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Video
Description: A flow that will convert a video file to another format
Author: FileFlows

Name: Video File
Description: A blank video file template with a single "Video File" input flow element.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Comic
Description: A flow that will convert a comic books from CBR, CBZ, CB7, PDF, GZ, BZ2 to either CBZ or PDF
Author: FileFlows

Name: Image Resize
Description: A flow that resizes images
Author: FileFlows

Name: Image File
Description: A blank Image template with a single "Image File" input flow element.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Audio File
Description: A blank Audio template with a single "Audio File" input flow element.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Gotify Notification
Description: A failure flow that will send a warning message to Gotify with the failed filename.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Image
Description: A flow that converts images
Author: FileFlows

Name: Telegram Notification
Description: A failure flow that will send a warning message to Telegram with the failed filename.
Author: FileFlows

Name: URL
Description: A blank URL template with a single "Input URL" input flow element.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Failure Flow
Description: Basic failure flow that will be executed when a flow failures for any reason.
Author: FileFlows

Name: File
Description: A blank file template with a single "Input File" input flow element.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Convert Audio to Video
Description: Convert an audio file into a video file generated a visualization of the audio.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Apprise Notification
Description: A failure flow that will send a warning message to Apprise with the failed filename.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Discord Notification
Description: A failure flow that will send a warning message to Discord with the failed filename.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Create Audio Book
Description: Allows a user to create audio books from folders containing the chapters of audio books and merges them into a single audio book m4b file.
Author: FileFlows

Name: Folder
Description:
A blank folder template with a single "Input Folder" input flow element.

NOTE: This template should only be used to process a Folder instead of Files.  Processing a Folder has processing limitations as the Folder is being processed and not files contained in that folder.
Author: FileFlows
